about_the_game:
Story Introduction

"Mystical Daily Life in the Spirit School" - When Cherry Blossoms Bloom, Spiritual Power Awakens!
Stepping into the campus, you encounter a mysterious cherry tree. At the touch, spiritual power surges, and a magical adventure begins!
Meet classmates with special abilities and uncover the long-hidden supernatural mysteries of the campus. Talk to ghosts, resolve obsessions, and face the mysterious conspiracy unfolding in the shadows.
Here, every choice will change your destiny. Are you ready to embark on a magical campus journey filled with friendship, love, and courage?
University life has never been this exciting!

Our Promise

This game offers over 100,000 words of story, Japanese voice acting for all characters except the protagonist, and a wealth of animations and CGs.
The game will support a rich set of achievements and cloud save features.
Disclaimer: All characters in this work are over 18 years old at the time of the game's storyline.

About Us: HaKoLoYi Studio.

We are a group of dream-driven game developers with experience from companies like Tencent, NetEase, Seasun, and Ubisoft. Now, we've come together to form this indie game team focusing on visual novels.
This work is our debut. It may not be perfect, but it marks the beginning of our dream chase. We promise to keep improving and strive to bring more quality works to players.
Your every support is our driving force. Let's weave the future of gaming together!

short_description: "Spirit School Days": Campus Romance Meets Supernatural Adventure Step into a mysterious campus and begin an extraordinary college life. Play as a new freshman, meet unique characters, and together uncover supernatural mysteries. Every choice shapes your story, creating unique memories of youth.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Indonesian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
